content: Stream created by Joe Moeller.

We're hosting a seminar on applied category theory. The first talk is by John Baez on Wednesday April 1. He's talking about structured cospans and double categories. Here's the website.
https://sites.google.com/ucr.edu/actucr
We're going to be doing the talks via Zoom, and we intend to upload them to YouTube after. We'll be having the "virtual coffee break" after the talks here on Zulip.
Will the discussion be right here, on the stream ACT@UCR seminar? I imagine so...
Yes, that's the intent. I'll make a topic for each talk.
